Posts.Content: MsCjay wrote: The Lymphedema Diagnosis and Treatment Cost Saving Act of 2011, HR 2499, has been reintroduced. Please visit http://www.lymphedematreatmentact.org/ for more information and to contact your members of Congress, urging that they pass this bill. Lymphedema results in swelling of a body part, or parts, when lymphatic vessels and/or lymph nodes are inadequate, damaged or removed. Breast cancer survivors are at a greatly increased risk for acquiring lymphedema. This bill will ensure that lymphedema patients receive comprehensive treatment coverage for their care, including coverage for compression garments and other supplies. There are many simply ways you can support passage of this bill - please visit http://www.lymphedematreatmentact.org/ to learn more. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymphedema Treatment Act HR 2499 MsCjay TenderIsOurMight
